title: Google Play Store users in Russia can no longer buy apps or subscriptions [Updated]
content:
Google has informed Android developers that Play Store users in Russia have lost the ability to purchase apps, games, IAPs, and subscriptions.

description: Google today told Android app developers that Play Store users in Russia will soon no longer be able to purchase apps, games, subscriptions...
